title: Players Pride?
body:
Well, LoL is fun, but some people ruins it, i don't know why players are this serious to every game, things were going bad these days, players have gone mad just because you lose a normal game?
It's fun to play games, playing games are for fun right? Some youtubers see games as an income, some serious players see games as a life, how do you see LoL? 
I've met enough spoilers, they ruin your games right? 
These days, people playing normals are mad. Someone calls a lane, but some people fast-locks a champion without a word, then we see him as a random lane based on their champion and spells, but in the game, they just take the lane they want, like 2 mids. 
Some people is like, more "aggressive", calls a lane later than the other player, then doesn't think about others feelings, either duo mid/top or feed/afk. How do other players feel?
Dear gamers, i'm not a pro or anyone, i'm just myself, i can't force you guys to do stuff, but please remember, the world will never stop spinning because of you, don't mess with other players feeling if your unhappy, we don't want it, keep it yourself. People that always need others to give them patience won't success. Who do you think you are? Yes, your like me, nobody, everybody is fair, we are humans, not your toys to play or blame.
How do you guys think about aggressive players these days? Getting quite bored of them huh?
Gaming for fun, always with pride.

replies.body: Well not mainly about picking spots, but it's about how players react to themselves

lol normals are a joke... only play normals if you meet this single condition
1. you main jungle/support/adc... why might you ask? supp is rarely taken, jg is easy to type really fast and hit enter (not many ppl like to play jungle anyways) and adc is also really easy to type in and hit enter... 

if you main top or mid, sorry but you have to learn these champions in bot games or go into normal queue and spam mid/top or feed then instalock...

to avoid going into normals and spamming mid/top or feed I recommend watching the pros use this champion as well as spamming intermediate ai games...  just to get yourself familiar with its mechanics.

i would avoid learning the following:
Lb
Kat
these are 100% pick ban in low elo

top laners are** rarely banned.,**.. most banned top laners include Riven Gnar Cho

instead learn to use:  
Annie
Syndra
Xerath 
Ziggs 
Cho
Tip: Type what role you want to play somewhere, hold down the shift button, press the arrow key to highlight it then press ctrl+c (copy), ctrl+v (paste).
